home.title: ParkU - Smart Parking Solutions
home.description: Book and list parking spots effortlessly with ParkU. Find free parking nearby on our interactive map and manage your spots with ease.

features.title: Why Choose ParkU?
features.description: Experience the future of parking with our innovative features designed to make finding and managing parking spots simple and efficient.

map.title: Interactive Map View
map.description: Locate free parking spots nearby with our real-time interactive map. See availability at a glance and navigate directly to your spot.

booking.title: Easy Booking
booking.description: Reserve parking spots in seconds. Choose your preferred time and duration, and pay securely through the app.

list.title: List Your Spots
list.description: Turn your unused parking space into extra income. List your spots easily and manage bookings with our user-friendly interface.

secure.title: Secure & Reliable
secure.description: Your data and transactions are protected with top-tier security. Enjoy peace of mind with verified users and secure payments.

mobile.title: Mobile-First Design
mobile.description: Optimized for mobile devices, ParkU works seamlessly on iOS and Android. Access all features on the go.

community.title: Community Driven
community.description: Join a growing community of drivers and spot owners. Share feedback and help improve parking in your area.

mapView.caption: Discover available parking spots on our interactive map

cta.title: Ready to Revolutionize Your Parking Experience?
cta.description: Download ParkU today and never worry about finding parking again. Join thousands of users who have simplified their daily commute.

about.title: About ParkU
about.description: ParkU is revolutionizing urban parking by connecting drivers with available parking spots through a seamless, technology-driven platform.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To eliminate the stress of finding parking and maximize the utilization of urban parking spaces.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: In busy cities, finding parking can be frustrating and time-consuming. Drivers waste valuable time circling blocks, while parking owners leave spots unused.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: ParkU bridges the gap by allowing spot owners to list their spaces and drivers to book them instantly via our intuitive app.

find.title: Find Spots
find.description: Use our interactive map to locate available parking spots near your destination.

book.title: Book Instantly
book.description: Reserve your spot with just a few taps. Choose your preferred time and duration.

park.title: Park & Go
park.description: Arrive at your reserved spot and park confidently. No more guessing or circling.

cta.title: Join the ParkU Community
cta.description: Download the app today and experience hassle-free parking.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: The passionate individuals behind ParkU, dedicated to transforming urban parking.

section.title: Our Team
section.description: Get to know the people driving ParkU forward.

anamaria.name: Anamaria Miskovic
anamaria.responsibility: Responsible for social media strategy and brand presence

flavia.name: Flavia Wenger
flavia.responsibility: Responsible for company vision, strategy, and leadership

lea.responsibility: Responsible for operations, key business contacts, and functional oversight

melvin.responsibility: Responsible for social media initiatives and strategic partnerships

mina.responsibility: Responsible for financial management and internal business process

irina.responsibility: Responsible for software development and technical architecture

cta.title: Want to Join Our Team?
cta.description: We're always looking for talented individuals to help us innovate in the parking space.

download.title: Download ParkU
download.description: Get the app and start parking smarter today. Available on iOS and Android.

section.title: Choose Your Platform
section.description: ParkU is available for download on all major mobile platforms.

ios.name: iOS
ios.description: Download from the App Store for iPhone and iPad.

android.name: Android
android.description: Get it on Google Play for Android devices.

cta.title: Not Ready to Download Yet?
cta.description: Learn more about ParkU and how it can change your parking experience.
